alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:57PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Garfield and southwestern Wheeler Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 457 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Ericson, or 19 miles northeast of Ord, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ericson and Pibel Lake State Recreation Area. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 132 and 136. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
